name: Frontline Steel
description:
Amidst the endless war of 2 evil countries, Cyan and Magenta, you, a Cyan pilot, are given a mission to take over one of Magenta's city.

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: Space
  • Look Around: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Button
  • Dash: Right Button / Shift
  • Confirm: Enter
  • Cancel: Escape

Started a week late because I'm a dummy :( So much stuff I haven't done (choosing sides, more than one horrible music, boss, etc.) I might continue working on this though.
